collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (2 total Queries, 2 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql:
select *, tc.status
        from tbl_clients as tc, tbl_firm as tf
        where tc.fID = tf.firmID
        and tc.fID = 1

timelineData.name: Query

select *, tc.status
        from tbl_clients as tc, tbl_firm as tf
        where tc.fID = tf.firmID
        and tc.fID = 1
